name: Tap to fly
description:
This game is simple, tap to fly and let see how long you can survive till you fall down and dead

Story Not a very good story but it would do in small game like this, anyway. 14 years old kid come to a highest rooftop in downtown, it's his first time. Another kid(actually this one is bullies) push him away from the rooftop. Luckly that kid can flap his hand and fly off but.. not in a long time, he dead Game
  • Tap to fly
  • Tap too fast and fly off like superman? No. He flaping his hand to fly, if he keep flaping, he will lost his durability
  • Fly too high? No. His durability is too weak
  • Someone think you are an alien! He trhowing a rock at you
  • Bird poo, i know it's gross but it's fun
